overview: The body and the mind transform into a powerful vehicle when functioning simultaneously. Muscles contort and the mind invites unwanted visitors; fear, anxiety, and doubt, all of which can tear apart intimacy and orgasm. Submerge captures how the mental and the physical intertwine, sometimes unwarranted, and anxiety manifests in the form of an inconspicuous cry of an undetermined oddity.
tagline: For Marilyn, bathing is an over-stimulation of her senses.
title: Submerge
